title: PBE maintenance problem
body: Does anyone know how much this maintenance of PBE server will ever solve cause im waiting like 4 hours to enter on PBE and is says its unavailable since 8:30 pm yesterday.

replies.body: It looks like there's a ticker on the top right of the PBE boards that suggests a 2 hour maintenance on the PBE. I don't have any information beyond that, so make sure to bookmark PBE boards for news. Let me know if that clears things up!
IKR!!! I also was wondering ._. I mean its the PBE so it shouldnt matter that much but still xd
